headline: Romance Novel Awards Are Canceled This Year
abstract: The organization, criticized for its handling of a racism accusation, said it wouldnâ€™t hold its annual contest after entrants and judges pulled out.
lead_paragraph: The Romance Writers of America ended 2019 reeling from the backlash to its handling of a racism accusation. It is beginning this year by canceling its 2020 awards for romance novels, known in the industry as the Ritas, after it said that several contestants and judges had already pulled out.
